title: How do I claim my money from a suspended GCash Basic account
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [I want to update my address or work information in GCash](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45260364962329-I-want-to-update-my-address-or-work-information-in-GCash)
- [I want to update my GCash email address](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/45259632531225-I-want-to-update-my-GCash-email-address)

- [I want to change my mobile number linked to my GCash account](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/9059222758041-I-want-to-change-my-mobile-number-linked-to-my-GCash-account)
- [My GCash account is on hold. How can I access my account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/18374080547609-My-GCash-account-is-on-hold-How-can-I-access-my-account)
- [I was Fully Verified, why was my GCash account downgraded to a basic account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31782046693529-I-was-Fully-Verified-why-was-my-GCash-account-downgraded-to-a-basic-account)
- [GScore](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566894-GScore)
- [How do I transfer money and services from my old GCash account to my new one?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/5857695373081-How-do-I-transfer-money-and-services-from-my-old-GCash-account-to-my-new-one)
- [How do I claim my money from a suspended GCash Basic account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38827343196185-How-do-I-claim-my-money-from-a-suspended-GCash-Basic-account)
- [Why was my GCash account deactivated?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/19643426242201-Why-was-my-GCash-account-deactivated)

[See more](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/sections/360004657754-Manage-Your-Account)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

If your account stays non-verified for 12 months after registration, it will be restricted, and you'll be charged a monthly **Basic Account Maintenance Fee of PHP 15 monthly**. To access your remaining balance, you can either **create a new GCash account or verify your current Basic account.**

To access your funds, you may follow these steps:

**If you have another GCash Account under your name**

1. Make sure your new GCash account is [Fully Verified](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
2. Prepare any one of the following [**valid IDs** accepted](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
3. [Submit a ticket to transfer the funds from your old number to your number number.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=my_gcash_account__my_gcash_basic_account_was_suspended__please_transfer_the_funds_to_my_new_fully_verified_account)

Youâ€™ll get a confirmation email in your GCash registered email address about your transfer of funds request within **48 hours.**

**If you plan to keep your mobile number and verify your account**

1. Prepare [an accepted valid ID](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification) and take a selfie while holding it.
2. [Submit a ticket to temporarily lift your account suspension.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=my_gcash_account__my_gcash_basic_account_was_suspended__please_unblock_my_account_so_i_can_complete_the_full_verification_and_regain_access_to_it)

Once lifted, log in to your GCash and [complete your verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account) within **24 hours.** Failure to do so will mean your account will be re-suspended.
